features: 32 REGULAR-SIZED ROLLS: 32 rolls of Scott 1000 Trusted Clean Toilet Paper, 1-ply—the same trusted performance and long-lasting rolls, now with a new look; packaging may vary from images shown
A TRUSTED BRAND: For generations, you’ve trusted Scott—our septic-safe toilet paper uses clog-free technology, lasts longer and dissolves faster* and breaks down 10x faster**
1000 SHEETS PER ROLL: America’s #1 long lasting brand and you always get 1000 sheets per roll for fewer roll changes
SIMPLY MADE: Free of perfumes or scents, so no need to worry about allergies or irritation
SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue
body.description: Scott 1000 Toilet Paper helps you spend time on what matters most with fewer roll changes and more value. With Scott 1000 Toilet Paper, you get 32 rolls of 1,000 sheets, so you have plenty of toilet paper for you and your loved ones. Plus, each roll of Scott 1000 bathroom tissue helps you get the job done with 1000 durable 1-layer sheets and lasts longer, dissolves faster* and breaks down 10x faster**. Scott 1000 1-ply toilet paper even dissolves quickly, so it’s kinder to your plumbing, sewer-safe and septic-safe. We’ve been trusted for generations: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue. Keep life rolling by ordering Scott 1000 in bulk online! *vs the leading brand mega roll **vs the leading brand one ply

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is Scott 1000 Trusted Clean safe for RVs and boats? Yes, Scott 1000 Trusted Clean is safe for use in RVs, boats, marinas, outhouses, and other non-traditional bathroom settings. What ply is Scott 1000 Trusted Clean toilet paper? Scott 1000 Trusted Clean toilet paper is 1-ply and purposefully made to last longer on the roll, get the job done easily, and break down fast in a variety of sewer/septic systems. Is Scott 1000 Trusted Clean toilet paper safe for septic systems? Yes. Scott 1000 Trusted Clean toilet paper is 100% sewer and septic-safe and clog-free, and begins breaking down immediately upon flushing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, strong
reviews.reviewText: As a female, I use more toilet paper & I find it to outlast anything else I've ever used. It is strong (unless you try to use it to wipe up a little water on the bathroom counter), & it doesn't produce & leave behind "dust." It may not be as soft to the touch as the dust-producing papers, but if you don't rub the hell out of your bottom (haha), you won't have a problem.The thing I find funny about how many plys toilet paper has is that all the manufacturer has to do is make the paper thicker. In the case of this product, when the circumstance needs it, you can fold it over as much as you might need to & the roll still lasts longer.Scott is a great value for the money & I shall continue to use it as long as it remains so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Septic Systems
reviews.reviewText: This is the only toilet paper we use in my house. I love that it is easy on the septic system. I live in an almost 100 year old house and don't want to have to deal with issues like that. It's not soft at all but I like that. I feel like the soft toilet paper leaves fuzz and tends to rip. I'm not sure what the obsession with soft toilet paper is because that doesn't matter one bit to me. I've tried some generic types of paper similar to this but it is too thin. This is thin, too, but a better quality than toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have difficulty getting around especially doing shopping. Love the quantity this comes in. So I'm set for a while. Have been using Scott tissue for years--careful for the septic system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Long lasting because it has 1,000 sheets per roll. Thin and not as plush but does the job it's intended to do. I've used it for decades. Cheapest price per roll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does it's job economically
reviews.reviewText: It's 1 ply so it's not that cushy tissue soft paper. That said, it performs it's function, is septic friendly, and does not leave behind fibers. It's not a good substitute for tissue if you have a cold. I'd recommend a lotion containing tissue for that. It's really helpful if you have kids that tend to wad the paper up and clog things up. Since it's really a personal preference, I guess I would recommend purchasing a pack and trying it out to see if it works out for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like SCOTT
reviews.reviewText: The price is kinda high, but it’s good toilet paper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars is a good product and soft and last long
reviews.reviewText: i am happy it was delivered even they thought it was lose but i really like this toilet papper because it last and it is a very good material very recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Nasty Paper Residue Left On Privates
reviews.reviewText: This is the only toilet paper my daughter and I use. Highly recommend for women. Love how it doesn’t stick to your privates like 2Ply. I do keep Amazon brand 2 Ply for the men in the house and it gives my guests a choice. All men care about is softness because they’re just wiping their butt. Women like to be paper/pill free all day at least I do. Take a mirror and look at all the paper left behind on overly soft toilet paper its gross. This is highly recommended for keeping clean ladies
Excelente tamaño, de hoja y de largo! muy rendidor, no como LOS ROLLOS TIPICOS EN MEXICO ,PETALO, REGIO, KLEENEX, ETC, su TAMAÑO ES RIDICULO! COMO PARA BEBES!🤡
Si vien son más hojas, 🍂 el papel es tan delgado que terminas usando más de lo normal para limpiar el ( )*( )Por lo tanto gastas más papel que con una marca más conocida
